headline: Citigroup (C) Raises Loan Loss Provisions
summary: Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) is one of the best Goldman Sachs bank stocks. Citigroup is setting aside more money to prepare for the possibility that some customers may have trouble repaying their loans. Speaking at a Morgan Stanley conference, Citi’s Head of Banking, Vis Raghavan, said credit costs will likely rise by a few hundred million […]
